cause.description:
Have you ever noticed when you're watching a movie at a theatre and someone gets shot. Note the reaction: laughs, chears, even claps... Yet when a poor dog or mouse gets tortured, the reaction is quite diffrent: Awwww, even tears.
1. Animals have the right to life
2. Animals cannot protect themselves against us, it is our duty to protec them
3. Animals are an important part in our life development
4. Take a stand for the innocent lives who can't
5. Saving the planet, one animal at a time
cause.mission: Make sure animals have a good quality of life
cause.name: STOP Animal Cruelty
